description.value:
You embrace your anger, willingly entering a controlled rivener state and maintaining your mental faculties. Your body grows and expands, becoming Large. Your equipment grows with you, but returns to its natural size if removed. Your reach increases by 5 feet, and you gain a +2 status bonus to melee damage. You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1}. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes, or until you choose to end it early as a single action that has the concentrate trait. When your transformation ends, you become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fatigued] for 10 minutes.

At 13th level and 17th level, the bonus damage increases by 2
